channel.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
channel.description:
So I've decided to try and start a development team again. I have some funds to get us started, but overall, I would like to see this as a rsps funded by it's community. Some may think that sounds outrageous or bold, but I've seen servers out there that were just renamed Trisidia releases getting 15 players online a day and a constant stream of cash. That just means there are endless possibilities for [i]real*[/i] servers. [size=2pt]*[/size][size=1pt]by real I mean one that isn't just a renamed leech.[/size]
Please understand "Just another PI" is not the real slogan of the server. I figured, regardless of what I put there, people would see it as "just another PI" since it's a PI based server.
Now, lets move onto the content. [code=Content] Custom Forum Integration! (Not required to play :O) Item & NPC definitions, npc drops, npc spawns, custom objects, and shops loaded through json. Custom dungeoneering (To be rewrote) Custom yell titles (also needs to be worked on) My own dicing, not that it's unique. Beer barrels work. My own mystery boxes. Half-assed smiley system. "unique" teleport interface. [INFO] and Lottery tickers that have toggles. Pickables. All skills are working. There is no summoning. I replaced it with dungeoneering. I added some "anti cheat engine and anti rune-agent" crap in. It's not the best but it's something. I'll rewrite it when I can. [/code]
I guess this is media. If you want more or something else I mentioned, uh say it i guess? Format: image title (image here) [spoiler=media] Home [img]http://puu.sh/cC6bK/8d74e51216.jpg[/img] Updated Dungeoneering spot... Etheral guide now handles the shop along with resetting progress and checking floors. [img]http://puu.sh/cCmu6/eecfffc230.jpg[/img] The bank. Don't really need much more than the bank all icon tbh. [img]http://puu.sh/cC6XM/ddf6081e14.jpg[/img] So I'm sittin in a throne. Beer barrels in the back work. You grab a glass from the shelves and then use it on the barrels. I've got 1 of each drink. Also, say hi to my pet KBD. [img]http://puu.sh/cC79v/61418b509a.jpg[/img] Regular titles... [img]http://puu.sh/cC7kR/0de1be9f7d.jpg[/img] Custom one [img]http://puu.sh/cC8c4/9c8fd61e89.jpg[/img] Dicing (public) [img]http://puu.sh/cC96H/da801a973f.jpg[/img] Dicing (clan) [img]http://puu.sh/cC9cG/134d6fb38f.jpg[/img] teleport interface. I edited it so the nav buttons are on both sides, and the orange thing is on each side too. Other than that, not mine. [img]http://puu.sh/cC9hL/ea713d6be4.jpg[/img][img]http://puu.sh/cC9qa/131bbd3348.jpg[/img] Skill tab [img]http://puu.sh/cC9xJ/1035da07db.png[/img] Smilies (don't work in public chat :( ): [img]http://puu.sh/cC9G8/b95f27c68b.jpg[/img] This skill to combat thing... [img]http://i.imgur.com/FSaozjf.gif[/img] [/spoiler]
The team: Project owner/lead developer - Me Web developer - None Server/Client Developer - None Community Manager - Nolan Graphics master - None
Application**: [code] Position wanted: Background in position: Example works: Time available: Other info: [/code] **Application due to change.
So yeah. That's it for now. I will probably edit the thread later. If you have any questions or etc, post em below or my skype is on my profile.

item.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

Position wanted:
alpha/ beta testing, ideas, simple server sided coding

Background in position:
when im not working most of my free time goes to playing rsps and working on coding my own. i can play through the server like im a everyday player and test all the skills, minigames, quests ext. and look for glitches and bugs. also when you make updaes i can test those and help make sure they are working properly.

Example works:
working on codes and testing my own rsps. also played more rsps then i can name.

Time available:
i spend most of my time (when not working) on rsps or attempting to code mine. sometimes 50+ hrs in a week or sometimes 20 hours a week. if i really enjoy what i do on your server while trying to help then it is likely i spent most time on it then probably most people.

Other info:
if i come up with a idea of something to implement to your server i can try and write the codes and then give to you and ofcourse it is your decision to use it or not from there.
Also i am willing to learn nearly anything when it comes to rsps coding since i am working on one myself and still want to learn as much more as possible.
but since you already know more then me about coding i dont expect to really come up with much if anything that would couldnt already do yourself so mostly i would just be testing i guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

sk8rdude, I’d be more than happy to help out with advertising or beta testing.
Server’s looking considerably good right now

[spoiler=Suggestions!]
[ul][li][center]Ever thought of making a casino? Where you can go in, there’s poker, blackjack and more gambling games etc where you can gamble items such as armour pieces or even coins![/center][/li][/ul]

[ul][li][center][center]First person mode? That’d be really cool :P[/center][/center][/li][/ul]

[ul][li][center]Upgradeable items! Tier 1, Tier 2, Tier 3; the more you upgrade, the more powerful and cooler it looks. But upgrading comes at a valuable price :D[/center][/li][/ul]

[ul][li][center]In the wilderness, there could be CPU pkers which would actually be REALLY cool. They could spawn in sometimes with crappy armour or sometimes STACKED with pots and food and armour; maybe even a few valuables[/center][/li][/ul]
[/spoiler]

Carry on and this won’t be “just another PI”

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:8, topic:547600”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=666508.msg4456204#msg4456204 date=1415060144]
I love your office lololol, and are you integrating your custom skill level display > combat level display or nah?
[/quote]

The skill / combat level display already exists in the client, it was just never utilized.[/quote]
This, honestly…

(Thanks for the bump Atomic lol).
I was editing something in player updating and noticed a variable set to 0. I was like, the fuck is this shit? So I went client sided and found the same data (but in stream not out)… Eventually it led me to the method where you draw the right click player menu… And in that code? It had 2 different options, the default combat showing, and then the skill showing… However skill showing wasn’t implemented…

TL;DR I basically connected a couple fuckin dots.

[hr]
Some updates to show the server is alive still
Note these aren’t in my update log I was using… I moved to github.

Fixed scrollbar nullpointer (Scrolling where interfaces didn't exist threw nullpointers) Removed the "custom gameframes" so there's only the 1 now. Server sided maps updated to 508 - Matching client maps Teleporting rewrote - No more process based teleports. New setting interface (extended options for the info/lotto ticker, skill display, and more) Fixed an arrow bug.

These aren’t all the updates… I have never been good at keeping track. Even with the use of github. lol.

Looking for an advertiser. Important!

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

nolan2131:

I love your office lololol, and are you integrating your custom skill level display > combat level display or nah?

The skill / combat level display already exists in the client, it was just never utilized.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Not very many updates. A lot of content is already done, so I do not need to work on a majority of it.
A good portion of what I’m doing is just bug testing already existing features.

[code].LOG
10:05 AM 11/4/2014
Created an update log.
Fixed Gnome course more (Still buggy tho).
Fixed Farming level up interface.
Fixed hunter net bug (didn’t check for one in inventory)
Misc. bug fixes and improvements.
10:11 AM 11/4/2014
Rewrote the core of hunter. Cleaner code and less “junk code” now.

10:25 AM 11/4/2014
Fixed hunter level up interface (Same issue as farming).
12:57 PM 11/4/2014
Converted dungeoneering emote to CycleEvent and fixed emote for Dungeoneering master cape.
Did some Dialogue edits for easier dialogues later.
1:02 PM 11/4/2014
Fixed Dungeoneering emote so you can’t walk during it.
1:54 PM 11/4/2014
Added new emote system. Should fix all issues with emotes.
Added missing emotes (Still missing 1 fudgeing sprite tho)
10:38 AM 11/5/2014
Playing with the client. Renaming some stuff thanks to Ambokile. No real updates.
8:24 PM 11/6/2014
Finished tweaking emote timers.[/code]

Here’s some updates from the past few days. Note I wasn’t at home so I couldn’t use my full environment.

Edit:
Still looking for more team. :3
The updates are to show the project is still alive.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Pm’d you, Sk8r.

Edit: Excited to be apart of this project with you.

item.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I thought I remembered that red crown in the photos you sent me, just wasn’t sure if you were keeping it in the files or not. Anyhow, if you ever need any help or some perspective just hit me up man; and make sure I know when this is up, I want to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Skarred-Lands - "Just another PI"
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

nolan2131:

I love your office lololol, and are you integrating your custom skill level display > combat level display or nah?

That’s integrated actually. I didn’t think to add a picture of it.
Also, what server do you think I first tested that on?

Added more media.
Also:
Updated Dungeoneering spot… Etheral guide now handles the shop along with resetting progress and checking floors.
